alert.note: Alert for Northern Cayuga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 7:11AM EST until January 11 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected today. Heavy lake effect snow expected tonight and Monday. Total ice accumulation a few hundredths of an inch today. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Cayuga county. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Periods of snow will result in snow covered roads and limited visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
